sceneWithVariations.name: Scene + Variations (No Episodes)
sceneWithVariations.description: SimReady 3D scene (USD, semantics/physics ready) with 250 Replicator-driven layout variations

episodesOnly.name: Episodes Only
episodesOnly.description: 2,500 sim-validated robot episodes (10 per variation across 250 variations)
requires: Customer must provide scene or purchase scene separately

episodesWithReplayLicense.name: Episodes Only + Replay License
episodesWithReplayLicense.description: Episodes plus scene USD for re-rendering with new cameras/sensors
includes: License to re-render with new viewpoints

bundle.name: Complete Bundle (Scene + Variations + Episodes)
bundle.description: Full package: SimReady scene, 250 variations, and 2,500 episodes

pack10.name: 10-Scene Bundle Pack
pack10.description: 10 complete scene bundles (scene + variations + episodes each)

pack25.name: 25-Scene Bundle Pack
pack25.description: 25 complete scene bundles (scene + variations + episodes each)

pack50.name: 50-Scene Bundle Pack
pack50.description: 50 complete scene bundles (scene + variations + episodes each)

highValue.description: For high-value tasks with proven training lift
highValue.notes: Requires validation metrics: collision rate, success rate, held-out generalization

foundationModel.notes: Typically involves annual contracts rather than per-scene pricing

comparableSpending.note: Google planned ~$200M spend with Scale in 2025

whenToChargeMore: Quality metrics: low collision rate, high success rate

marketTestingRecommendation.adjustmentStrategy: If closing easily, raise 15-20%. If high drop-off, lower 15-20%.

notes: Anchored against synthetic data platform subscriptions ($15k/month) and frontier AI training data budgets
Episodes priced at ~$1.80 per episode for 2,500-episode bundles
Bundle pricing incentivizes complete purchases with ~15% discount
Volume pricing follows typical SaaS bulk discount curves
For world-model/foundation-model teams, expect custom annual licensing discussions
